com.here.platform.location.core.graph.javadsl

Interface PointBasedProperty<T>


  • public interface PointBasedProperty<T>
    Represents the value of a property together with the offset on the entity to which this value applies.

    An example of such a property are the positions of stop signs on the road. If there is a stop sign shortly before the next intersection, 95% of the way along the road segment, the corresponding PointBasedProperty would be PointBasedProperty(0.95, StopSign)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double offset()
      The relative offset.
      T value()
      The value of the property.

    • Method Detail

      • offset

        double offset()
        The relative offset. It must be in the [0.0; 1.0] range.

      • value

        T value()
        The value of the property.
